jobs.description: Responsible for evaluating loan applications, conducting credit assessments, and managing loan portfolios.
Oversee the operations of the branch, manage staff, ensure compliance with regulations, and achieve branch targets.
Responsible for financial reporting, bookkeeping, and maintaining accurate records of financial transactions.
Analyze creditworthiness of loan applicants, review financial statements, and assess risks associated with lending.
Handle customer inquiries, provide assistance, resolve issues, and promote excellent customer service.
Develop and implement risk management policies, identify potential risks, and ensure compliance with regulations.
Conduct internal audits, assess financial controls, identify areas for improvement, and ensure compliance with policies.
Provide technical support, troubleshoot hardware and software issues, and maintain IT infrastructure.
Develop and implement marketing strategies, conduct market research, and promote the bank's products and services.
